thread.title: Bowyer lands ride with HScott before replacing Tony Stewart
thread.title_full: Bowyer lands ride with HScott before replacing Tony Stewart - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Dan Gelston, Ap Sports Writer
title: Bowyer lands ride with HScott before replacing Tony Stewart
text: Photo: Chuck Burton, AP Tony Stewart, right, laughs as he talks with team co-owner Gene Haas, center, and Clint Bowyer, left, as they leave a news conference on Stewart's retirement from driving NASCAR Sprint Cup series racing after the 2016 season at Stewart-Haas Racing's headquarters in Kannapolis, N.C., Wednesday, Sept. 30, 2015. Tony Stewart, right, laughs as he talks with team co-owner Gene... DOVER, Del. (AP) — Clint Bowyer will spend next season with HScott Motorsports before he takes over for Tony Stewart in 2017. Tony Stewart, right, laughs as he talks with team co-owner Gene Haas, center, and Clint Bowyer, left, as they leave a news conference on Stewart's retirement from driving NASCAR Sprint Cup series racing after the 2016 season at Stewart-Haas Racing's headquarters in Kannapolis, N.C., Wednesday, Sept. 30, 2015. Tony Stewart, right, laughs as he talks with team co-owner Gene... DOVER, Del. (AP) — Clint Bowyer will spend next season with HScott Motorsports before he takes over for Tony Stewart in 2017.
